sentence.Network_en: He discards his winter underclothing when weather gets warm.
sentence.Network_cn: 天气转暖时他脱去冬天穿的内衣.

sentence.Network_en: See PPG underclothing, style, design, colors is all basic classic style.
sentence.Network_cn: 看PPG的衬衣, 款式 、 设计 、 颜色都是基本经典款.

PerfectNetExp.abs: we discard our winter underclothing when the weather gets warmer ., 天气转暖我们抛开冬天穿的内衣.
underclothing made of this cloth .法兰绒内衣用这种布做的内衣

list.abs: They had given him new underclothes and a clean suit of overalls ., 他们给他换了新内衣和一套干净的工作服.
devise and empolder the fashionable underclothes ., 时装内衣设计与开发探讨.
she put on her newest underclothing and her nicest stockings and the dressthe symbol of her prettiness .她穿上自己的新内衣，最精致的长袜，还有那件象征她的美丽的裙子。
underskirt 内衣underwear, underclothes 内衣忏underpants, pants 内衣忏 (美作:shorts)

entry.def: Underclothing is the same as underclothes .

example.tran: 一个普通的男士内衣品牌

means.word_mean: 1. undergarment worn next to the skin and under the outer garments

auth_sentence.content: "Shapewear" underclothing for chaps will appear, reproachfully, on the shelves we visit.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"在……下"; 2. "副手"; 3. 表示"不足,不够"

stems_affixes.word_buile: under在……下+handed手的→在底下做手脚
under不足,不够+develop发展+ed……的→发展不够
under不足,不够+graduate大学毕业[生]→n.大学肄业生,[尚未取得学位的]大学生;adj.大学生的
under不足,不够+populate移民于+ed表形容词→adj.人口稀少的
under不足,不够+sized大小的→不够大的
under在……下+neath下面→adv.在下面 prep.在……的下面

stems_affixes.value_cn: 大学肄业生,[尚未取得学位的]大学生
stems_affixes.word_buile: under不足,不够+graduate大学毕业[生]→n.大学肄业生,[尚未取得学位的]大学生;adj.大学生的
under在……下+neath下面→adv.在下面 prep.在……的下面
under在……下+line线→在字底下划线,引申为强调

stems_affixes.value_cn: 承担, 担任, 许诺, 保证
stems_affixes.word_buile: under在……下+take拿→在下面拿→承担, 担任

stems_affixes.value_cn: 签在……下, 给……保险, 签名, 承诺支付
stems_affixes.word_buile: under在……下+write写→v.签在……下, 给……保险, 签名, 承诺支付
under不足,不够+play玩→没玩够→说得不够的
